mapper.update: update member set member_grade=#{m_grade}, member_name=#{m_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_tel=#{m_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_pwd=#{m_password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_nick=#{m_nick, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email_ava=#{email_ava, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where member_email=#{m_email} and email_code=#{email_code}

update member set member_name=#{m_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_tel=#{m_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_pwd=#{m_password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_nick=#{m_nick, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where member_email=#{m_email}
mapper.delete: delete from member where to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')-to_char(email_time,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') > 1000000 and email_ava='0'
mapper.select: select member_num as m_no, member_name as m_name, member_nick as m_nick, member_email as m_email, member_tel as m_tel from member where member_num=#{m_no}

select member_num as m_no, member_name as m_name, member_nick as m_nick, member_ava as m_ava, member_grade as m_grade, member_email as m_email, member_tel as m_tel, member_pwd as m_password, email_code, email_ava, email_time from member where member_email=#{m_email} and member_pwd=#{m_password}
